title: Status
description: A Status entry for a resource in a report

resource_type.description: The type name of the resource, capitalized

resource.description:
The resource name, in the form Type[title]. **Deprecated**. This is always the same
                            string as the name of the property where this Status object is the value.

file.description: The pathname of the manifest file which declared the resource.

line.description: The line number in the manifest file which declared the resource.

evaluation_time.description:
The amount of time, in seconds, taken to evaluate the resource.
                            Not present in reports of `inspect` kind.

change_count.description: The number of properties which changed. Always 0 in reports of `inspect` kind.

out_of_sync_count.description: The number of properties which were out of sync. Always 0 in reports of `inspect` kind.

tags.description: The strings with which the resource is tagged

time.description: The time the resource was evaluated. In ISO 8601 format with 9 characters second-fragment

events.description: the Puppet::Transaction::Event objects for the resource

skipped.description: True if the resource was skipped, otherwise false.

failed.description:
True if Puppet experienced an error while evaluating this resource, otherwise false.
                            **Deprecated**

containment_path.description:
An array of strings; each element represents a container (type or class) that, together, make up
                            the path of the resource in the catalog.
